FuncDef: The display bgp instance error discard command displays BGP errors. The display bgp instance error discard command displays BGP errors.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a BGP multi-instance.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported. When double quotation marks are used around the string, spaces are allowed in the string.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display bgp instance a error discard
ExtraInfo: When a BGP fault occurs, the display bgp instance error discard command can be used to display BGP errors. BGP errors include neighbor errors, route errors, and errors indicating that the resource usage exceeds the limit.
